data.title: Princess MedallionClass® – Download Princess® Cruises App
data.meta_description: Learn about Princess MedalionClass® and all the Perks It Offers
data.meta_site_name: Cruises – Cruise Vacations – Find Best Cruises
data.text:
You walk along the corridor and voila! Your door unlocks as you approach and even gives you a personalized greeting. You’ll enjoy keyless entry with automatic door locks every time you enter your stateroom.

Hungry during Movies Under the Stars®? Realize you forgot sunscreen by the pool? Want to avoid a crowd or standing in line? Order whatever you need — burger, beer, extra towels, aloe, etc. — and we’ll deliver it to you.

Additional charge applies

Personalize your dining experience with Dine My Way reservations. Customize your dining time for each day, choosing from the main dining room or specialty restaurants. Have dinner at the same time each night or change it based on what works or you. Choose from a world of options while avoiding lines and wait times.

*Reservation times based on venue capacity and availability.

Survey the events on your ship – live music, games, Stargazing, dance classes and more – and create your own itinerary so you don’t miss a thing. Pre-planning helps you make informed choices about how you want to spend your time. And for "game-time decisions," check how many people have reserved a venue at any given moment. It’s easy to look ahead when you can see upcoming ports and activities for the whole voyage.

Play location-based scavenger hunts and other games directly on portals around your ship. You can even create an OceanTagalong® avatar that follows you throughout your cruise.

*Availability may vary by ship.

The all-in-one app interacts with your Medallion to put the MedallionClass digital experiences at your fingertips. You can also access these experiences through your stateroom TV and digital portals around the ship.
